title: Something I’m Proud Of
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Eli-senpai, your hair is so beautiful. It so shiny and soft<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>You have such long arms and legs, you also have a nice figure, and you’re good at dancing too, it must be so nice<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>....But you also have good points that only you have, right, Kasumi?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Of course! Kasumin is the pinnacle of cuteness! Kasumin knows that fact well, so Kasumin knows how to use it to my advantage!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Is that so?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Yeah! That’s why Kasumin wants you to be more self-conscious about your own strengths. You’re really amazing, Eli-senpai!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You always get straight to the point, huh, Kasumi. That part of you is just like Nico. ....That’s right, I guess I should better utilize things that I’m proud of<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>That’s the spirit! You definitely should! That way, Kasumin is sure that people who support you will be happy, and the number of your fans will increase!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I’m also really proud of the fact that I have a friend like you who is sincere with everyone no matter who they are, Kasumi<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>E-, Eli-senpai.... I love you!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
